Name: cottonseed oil refinery operation | soap | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/10:Manufacture of food products/104:Manufacture of vegetable and animal oils and fats/1040:Manufacture of vegetable and animal oils and fats
Description: Average technology for alkaline refining process, which refers to caustic soda being added to degummed crude oil, which reacts with the free fatty acids (FFA) to form soap stock.  The oil/soap mixture is separated using a centrifuge, and filtration is performed to further clarify the oil from the soap.
